chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (s0 s1 : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset (M2 prec_list s0 s1) sigma pa -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s0 sigma (pre_ad_O pa) /\ state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s1 sigma (pre_ad_I pa)

Premises:
M2 : forall A : Type, Map A -> Map A -> Map A
state = Map prec_list : Set
Inductive pre_ad : Set := pre_ad_empty : pre_ad | pre_ad_O : pre_ad -> pre_ad | pre_ad_I : pre_ad -> pre_ad
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
signature = Map nat : Set
state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> exists n : nat, MapGet nat sigma (pre_ad_concat pa a) = Some n /\ pl_tl_length p n : state -> signature -> pre_ad -> Prop
st_compat_check_0 = fix st_compat_check_0 (pa : pre_ad) (sigma : signature) (s : state) {struct s} : bool := match s with | @M0 _ => true | @M1 _ a p => match pl_compat_check p with | Some n => match MapGet nat sigma (pre_ad_concat pa a) with | Some m => n =? m | None => false end | None => false end | @M2 _ x y => st_compat_check_0 (pre_ad_O pa) sigma x && st_compat_check_0 (pre_ad_I pa) sigma y end : pre_ad -> signature -> state -> bool
mpl_compat_4 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list 1%N pl) -> mpl_compat s1 (M1 prec_list 0%N pl)
mpl_compat_3 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list 0%N pl) -> mpl_compat s0 (M1 prec_list 0%N pl)
mpl_compat_5 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list) (p : positive), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list (N.pos p~0) pl) -> mpl_compat s0 (M1 prec_list (N.pos p) pl)
mpl_compat_6 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list) (p : positive), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list (N.pos p~1) pl) -> mpl_compat s1 (M1 prec_list (N.pos p) pl)
mpl_compat_2 : forall s0 s1 s2 s3 : state, mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M2 prec_list s2 s3) -> mpl_compat s1 s3
mpl_compat_1 : forall s0 s1 s2 s3 : state, mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M2 prec_list s2 s3) -> mpl_compat s0 s2
predtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (d d' : preDTA), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> predta_compatible d d'
states_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (s s' : state), state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma -> state_correct_wrt_sign s' sigma -> st_compatible s s'
dtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (d d' : DTA), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> dta_compatible d d'
dta_correct = fun d : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> Prop
st_compat_check = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) => st_compat_check_0 pre_ad_empty sigma s : state -> signature -> bool
dta_compat = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
st_compatible_compat : forall s0 s1 : state, st_compatible s0 s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1
mpl_compat_sym : forall s0 s1 : state, mpl_compat s0 s1 -> mpl_compat s1 s0
state_correct_wrt_sign = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> exists n : nat, MapGet nat sigma a = Some n /\ pl_tl_length p n : state -> signature -> Prop
st_compatible_compat_def = fun s0 : state => forall s1 : state, st_compatible s0 s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : state -> Prop
predta_compatible = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall s0 s1 : state, state_in_dta d0 s0 -> state_in_dta d1 s1 -> st_compatible s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
predta_compatible_compat_0 = fun (d1 : preDTA) (_ : predta_compatible (M0 state) d1) (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad) (H0 : MapGet state (M0 state) a0 = Some s0) (_ : MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1) => let H2 : Some s0 = Some s0 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 := match H0 in (_ = y) return (y = Some s0 -> mpl_compat s0 s1) with | eq_refl => fun H2 : MapGet state (M0 state) a0 = Some s0 => (fun H3 : MapGet state (M0 state) a0 = Some s0 => let H4 : False := eq_ind (MapGet state (M0 state) a0) (fun e : option state => match e with | Some _ => False | None => True end) I (Some s0) H3 in False...
predta_compat_check = fix predta_compat_check (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature) {struct d} : bool := match d with | @M0 _ => true | @M1 _ _ s => st_compat_check s sigma | @M2 _ x y => predta_compat_check x sigma && predta_compat_check y sigma end : preDTA -> signature -> bool
predta_correct_wrt_sign = fun (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature) => forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma : preDTA -> signature -> Prop
st_compatible = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some pl0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl1 -> pl_compatible pl0 pl1 : state -> state -> Prop
mpl_compat = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (p0 p1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some p0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some p1 -> pl_compat p0 p1 : state -> state -> Prop
dta_compat_check = fun (d : DTA) (sigma : signature) => match d with | dta p _ => predta_compat_check p sigma end : DTA -> signature -> bool
dta_correct_wrt_sign = fun (d : DTA) (sigma : signature) => match d with | dta d0 _ => predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma end : DTA -> signature -> Prop
pre_ad_ind : forall P : pre_ad -> Prop, P pre_ad_empty -> (forall p : pre_ad, P p -> P (pre_ad_O p)) -> (forall p : pre_ad, P p -> P (pre_ad_I p)) -> forall p : pre_ad, P p
pre_ad_rect : forall P : pre_ad -> Type, P pre_ad_empty -> (forall p : pre_ad, P p -> P (pre_ad_O p)) -> (forall p : pre_ad, P p -> P (pre_ad_I p)) -> forall p : pre_ad, P p
pre_ad_rec : forall P : pre_ad -> Set, P pre_ad_empty -> (forall p : pre_ad, P p -> P (pre_ad_O p)) -> (forall p : pre_ad, P p -> P (pre_ad_I p)) -> forall p : pre_ad, P p
prec_in_dta_diff_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
prec_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop

```coq
unfold state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset; intros.
split; intro Hscwso.
* apply st_compat_check_0 with (sigma := sigma) in Hscwso; simpl in Hscwso.
  destruct Hscwso as [H1 H2].
  apply mpl_compat_2 with (s0 := M2 prec_list s0 s1) (s2 := M2 prec_list s0 s1) (s3 := s1) in H2; auto.
  rewrite mpl_compat_4 in H2; auto.
  apply mpl_compat_sym in H2.
  rewrite mpl_compat_1 in H2; auto.
  apply mpl_compat_sym in H2.
  apply mpl_compat_3 in H2; auto.
  apply mpl_compat_sym in H2.
  apply mpl_compat_2 with (s0 := s0) (s2 := s0) (s3 := s1) in H2; auto.
  apply mpl_compat_1 in H2; auto.
* apply st_compat_check_0 with (sigma := sigma) in Hscwso; simpl in Hscwso.
  destruct Hscwso as [H1 H2].
  apply mpl_compat_2 with (s0 := M2 prec_list s0 s1) (s2 := s0) (s3 := s1) in H2; auto.
  rewrite mpl_compat_5 in H2; auto.
  apply mpl_compat_sym in H2.
  rewrite mpl_compat_6 in H2; auto.
  apply mpl_compat_sym in H2.
  apply mpl_compat_3 in H2; auto.
  apply mpl_compat_sym in H2.
  apply mpl_compat_2 with (s0 := s0) (s2 := s0) (s3 := s1) in H2; auto.
  apply mpl_compat_1 in H2; auto.
Qed.

original: unfold state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset; intros. split; intro Hscwso. * apply st_compat_check_0 with (sigma := sigma) in Hscwso; simpl in Hscwso. destruct Hscwso as [H1 H2]. apply mpl_compat_2 with (s0 := M2 prec_list s0 s1) (s2 := M2 prec_list s0 s1) (s3 := s1) in H2; auto. rewrite mpl_compat_4 in H2; auto. apply mpl_compat_sym in H2. rewrite mpl_compat_1 in H2; auto. apply mpl_compat_sym in H2. apply mpl_compat_3 in H2; auto. apply mpl_compat_sym in H2. apply mpl_compat_2 with (s0 := s0) (s2 := s0) (s3 := s1) in H2; auto. apply mpl_compat_1 in H2; auto. * apply st_compat_check_0 with (sigma := sigma) in Hscwso; simpl in Hscwso. destruct Hscwso as [H1 H2]. apply mpl_compat_2 with (s0 := M2 prec_list s0 s1) (s2 := s0) (s3 := s1) in H2; auto. rewrite mpl_compat_5 in H2; auto. apply mpl_compat_sym in H2. rewrite mpl_compat_6 in H2; auto. apply mpl_compat_sym in H2. apply mpl_compat_3 in H2; auto. apply mpl_compat_sym in H2. apply mpl_compat_2 with (s0 := s0) (s2 := s0) (s3 := s1) in H2; auto. apply mpl_compat_1 in H2; auto.
